ModMetaData.name: HousekeeperAssistanceCat
ModMetaData.author: Edge Crescent
ModMetaData.description:
Unofficial update for HousekeeperAssistanceCat mod by Edge Crescent. While using the same assets, background logic for cleaning tasks is fully reworked.
This mod adds a new kind of animal - Housekeeper Cat. When Obedience is trained, they are able to do cleaning tasks. They are also eligible for hauling training. As a bonus, they can produce small amounts of quality wool.
Supports Pawnmorpher partial morphs!
